definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Communities across the Gulf Coast were forever changed.
sentences.chinese: 整个波斯湾沿岸地区的社区永久性改变。

sentences.english: India, Russia, China, and Persian Gulf countries are all accumulating gold.
sentences.chinese: 印度，俄罗斯，以及波斯湾国家都在囤积黄金。

sentences.english: U.S. anti-missile ships are moving into the Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 美国的反导舰艇目前正开进波斯湾。

sentences.english: Located in Oman peninsula west bank, in the Persian gulf coast.
sentences.chinese: 位于阿曼半岛西岸，滨临波斯湾。

sentences.english: Saudis and other members of Gulf countries can come freely in and out of the country.
sentences.chinese: 沙特人和其他波斯湾国家的人能够自由出入也门。

sentences.english: Three inmates who attacked a Bosnian Serb war criminal in a British jail have been given additional prison sentences.
sentences.chinese: 在英国监狱中袭击波斯湾战犯的三名囚犯被加刑。

sentences.english: Rebranding it as a tourism city or not rebranding (remain the image of oil-rich countries)?
sentences.chinese: 波斯湾的富油国开始实施旅游政策。

sentences.english: People living in the South of Iran around the harbour of the Persian Gulf are called BANDARI.
sentences.chinese: 居住在伊朗南部环波斯湾地区的人称为班得瑞。

sentences.english: Switzerland, Scandinavia, Finland, Japan, and Gulf States 189
sentences.chinese: 瑞士，斯干那维亚半岛，芬兰，日本和波斯湾各国。

sentences.english: Feel the charming as Persian Gulf Iran. Enjoy the desirable life.
sentences.chinese: 感受伊朗波斯湾般的妩媚，尽享湾上卓越生活。

pinyin: Huo4 er3 mu4 zi1 Hai3 xia2
Zhi2 bu4 luo2 tuo2 Hai3 xia2
Da2 da2 ni2 er3 Hai3 xia2

definition: Hormuz, Iran, at the mouth of the Persian Gulf
